Room.Name: Fluffy White Clouds
Room.ShortDescription: Ooops. The clouds are pretty, but hide the direction indicator.
Room.LongDescription: It's like being inside a wet marshmallow, and you can't see a thing. It's hard to determine just how far a left or right turn will take you, and often when you come out of a cloud, you are many kilometers from where you think you should be.
